td.content: s:a 34 yo white M financier presents with moderate weakness, moderate nausea, moderate weight loss over several months and Cancer for 5 weeks. he has a history of Stomach Cancer for past 4 years. o:Height 192 cm, Weight 54.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

s:m financier aged 34 ys presents with 10 months history of moderate weakness, moderate nausea. pt reports moderate weight loss over several months. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 53.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.

s:patient presents with moderate nausea, moderate weight loss over several months and moderate weakness. he is having symptoms 15 x week, in spite of treatment. he is a white M aged 35 years. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 53.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt presents with 3 months history of moderate nausea, moderate weight loss over several months and moderate weakness. pt is a 35 yo white m financier. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 53.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.
